items.summary: Add the two newly uploaded image files `IMG_20260208_030749-3.jpg` and `image-1.jpg` to the frontend static assets directory at `frontend/public/assets/generated/` with the exact same filenames (including case and punctuation) so they are included in production builds.

Update the homepage (`frontend/src/App.tsx`) to load and display the newly added images using the existing deployment-safe `getAssetUrl(...)` helper (Vite `BASE_URL` compatible), without using absolute root paths. Use `IMG_20260208_030749-3.jpg` as the homepage couple-photo default/fallback image shown before any user selects a different file, and also render `image-1.jpg` visibly on the homepage as an additional photo element that does not interfere with the Yes/No button interaction or the Yes-button growth behavior.
